short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Share your tabs in ONE CLICK!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
-  A simple and easy-to-use tool to share chrome opened tabs while working on chrome.
-  You can share tabs in your Current window or all Chrome windows.
-  You can give a Custom Name to your tabs before sharing.
-  History feature allows you to check back on your past shared tabs.
- Use this tool to share links to your friends, and also as a single shareable bookmark for any group of websites.

NOTE: The extension only uses the active tabs open in the current session, and DOES NOT attempt to access your history.
